price: (35) And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense."
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ ٱللَّعۡنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka al-laʿnata ilā yawmi al-dīni
